column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ."
"Bu Kohat ne mbabanyin no ano fa fi Levi mbabanyin no mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua
column6: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do
column7: hɔn a wɔhɛn ɔsom no mu kɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no nyinara."

column2: "Iyi nye Kohat ne mbabanyin no hɔn edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: wɔ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn ho:"

column2: "sɛ nseraban no rubotu a
column3: Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no na wɔnkɔ mu
column5: na wɔmfa nkata dasedaka no do:"

column2: "na wɔmfa esukraman nwoma akatado nto do
column3: na wɔmfa tam a ne nyinara yɛ bibir nkata do
column4: na wɔmfa no mpoma no nhyehyɛ mu."

column2: "Na wɔmfa tam bibir nkata ɔkyerɛpaanoo pon no do
column3: na wɔmfa nkwansɛn no
column6: nye nkɔɔpow a wɔdze hue no nsisi do: na daa daa paanoo no nsi do:"

column2: "na wɔmfa tam memen nkata do
column3: na wɔmfa esukraman nwoma akatado nkata ho
column4: na wɔmfa no mpoma no nhyehyɛ mu."

column2: "Na wɔmfa tam bibir
column3: nkata kandzea no ne kandzeadua nye ne nkandzea
column6: nye no ngo ntoaba nyinara a wɔdze som no ho:"

column2: "na wɔmfa ɔno nye no ho adze nyinara nhyɛ esukraman nwoma akatado mu
column3: na wɔmfa nto pata no do."

column2: "Wɔmfa tam bibir nkata sika afɔrmbukyia no do
column3: na wɔmfa esukraman nwoma akatado nkata do
column4: na wɔmfa no mpoma no nhyehyɛ mu:"

column2: "na wɔmfa ɔsom ho ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔdze som wɔ ahotseweebea no nhyɛ tam bibir mu
column3: na wɔmfa esukraman nwoma akatado nkata ho
column4: na wɔmfa nto pata no do."

column2: "Na wɔnsesaw nso no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column3: na wɔmfa tam ɔberdum nkata do:"

column2: "na wɔmfa no ho ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔdze som wɔ ho no ngu do
column3: ogyasɛn
column7: afɔrmbukyia no ho ndzɛmba no nyinara; na wɔmfa esukraman nwoma akatado nkata do
column8: na wɔmfa no mpoma no nhyehyɛ mu."

column2: "Na sɛ nseraban no rubotu
column3: na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no wie ahotseweebea no
column4: nye ahotseweebea no ho ndzɛmba no nyinara do kata a; nna nkyii Kohat ne mbabanyin no mbra mbɔsoa: ahotseweebea no dze mma wɔnnka
column5: amma woeennwuwu. Ndzɛmba yi nye Kohat ne mbabanyin no hɔn adzesoa wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar n’ahwɛdodze nye kandzea no ho ngo no
column3: nduhuanhuam no
column6: ntamadan no nye dza ɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ mu no nyinara."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Hom nhwɛ ma wontwa Kohatfo ebusua ebusua mu ebusuakuw no mmfi Levifo no mu:"

column2: "na dza hom nyɛ mma hɔn ama woeenya nkwa na woeennwuwu
column3: sɛ wɔbɛn krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn no a: Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no nhɛn mu
column4: na wɔmfa hɔn nsisi obiara n’edwuma nye n’adzesoa ho:"

column2: "na hɔn dze
column3: mma wɔnnhɛn mu nnkɔhwɛ ahotseweebea no dɛ enyi robɔ do mpo

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
"ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do na kan hɔn; hɔn a wɔhɛn mu kɔsom dɛ wɔkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no nyinara."
"Iyi nye Gersonfo ebusua ebusua hɔn som wɔ ɔsom nye ndzesoa soa mu."
"Hɔn na wɔnsoa ntamadan no ne nsensɛnho atam no
column3: nye ehyiadzibuw no
column5: nye esukraman nwoma akatado no a ɔwɔ do wɔ sor no

column2: "nye pampan no ne nsensɛnho no
column3: nye pampan no n’abotsen abowano nkataano
column4: dza etwa ntamadan no nye afɔrmbukyia no ho ehyia no
column6: nye no ho edwuma ho ndzɛmba nyinara
column7: nye biribiara a wɔdze bɛyɛ no

column2: "Aaron nye ne mbabanyin mbrasɛm do na Gersonfo mbabanyin no nyɛ hɔn edwuma nyinara
column3: wɔ hɔn adzesoa nyinara
column4: nye hɔn edwuma nyinara mu: na hom mfa hɔn adzesoa nyinara nhyɛ hɔn nsa ma wɔnhwɛ do."

column2: "Iyi nye Gersonfo mbabanyin ebusua ebusua no hɔn edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu: na hɔn ahwɛdodze wɔ ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Itamar nsamu."
"Merari ne mbabanyin no dze
column3: kan hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua

column2: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do no mu
column3: obiara a ɔhɛn ɔsom no mu
column4: dɛ ɔkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no."

column2: "Na iyi nye hɔn adzesoa ahwɛdodze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edwuma nyinara tse wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu; ntamadan no ne ntaabow
column6: nye ne ngyinado na kan hɔn;"

column2: "na pampan no n’edum a etwa ho ehyia no
column3: nye ne ngyinado
column7: na ɔnye n’edwuma nyinara: na hom mfa hɔn adzesoa ahwɛdodze ndzɛmba no mbɔ dzin nhyɛ hɔn nsa."

column2: "Iyi nye Merari mbabanyin ebusua ebusua edwuma
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edwuma nyinara tse
column5: wɔ ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Itamar nsamu."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron nye mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba no kaan Kohatfo mbabanyin no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua
column3: nye hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do
column6: dɛ ɔkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no:"

column2: "na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee no wɔyɛ mpemebien ahaesuon eduonum."
"Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Kohatfo ebusua ebusua mu
column3: hɔn a wɔsoom wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu nyinara a Moses nye Aaron nam EWURADZE mbrasɛm a ɔwɔ Moses nsamu no do kanee no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Gerson mbabanyin mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua
column6: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do
column7: obiara a ɔhɛn ɔsom no mu
column8: dɛ ɔkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no
column11: nye hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee no

column2: "Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Gerson ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu
column3: hɔn a wɔsomee wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu nyinara a Moses nye Aaron nam EWURADZE mbrasɛm do kanee no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Merari mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ebusua ebusua nye hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column5: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do
column6: obiara a ɔhɛn ɔsom no mu
column7: dɛ ɔkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no
column9: "dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tse a wɔkaan hɔn no

column2: "Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Merari ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua a Moses nye Aaron nam EWURADZE mbrasɛm a ɔwɔ Moses nsamu no do kanee no."
"Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Levifo mu nyinara a Moses nye Aaron nye Israel mbapɔmba no kanee
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua
column6: "ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduasa nye ekyir do kodu hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do
column7: obiara a ɔhɛn mu dɛ ɔkɛyɛ ɔsom edwuma
column8: nye ndzesoa soa mu edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu"

column2: "a wɔkaan hɔn no
column3: wɔyɛ mpemawɔtwe ahaenum eduawɔtwe."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse na wɔnam Moses nsa do kaan hɔn
column3: obiara dɛ mbrɛ no som tse
column4: nye mbrɛ n’adzesoa tse no ara: dɛm na kaan hɔn
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no."
